## Lecture 10: Instance Based Learning

Key specific tasks we covered in this lecture:

* KNN classifier, with different k
* Euclidean distance, Mahalanobis distance
* kernel trick/transformation KNN
* kernel density local regression
* local linear regression / locally weighted regression
* locally weighted polynomial regression
* kernel regression classifier
